name: Iridescent (jiumycr)
description:
Nowadays, artificial intelligence is developing rapidly. In this game, I want to convey that although many scientific means help our lifemore convenient, the unique ways of thinking and emotional expressing of human beings are irreplaceable.  

This game tells one-week psychological changes of a man trapped in a laboratory by an artificial intelligence character. Although artificial intelligence can easily overstep human beings, they can not have rich emotions like a real man. In this game, the AI traps a man in a pure white laboratory and visualize his emotions, trying to perceive the emotions by repeated learning.
